Name: Charging Arm: Weaving
Desc:
Evades enemy attacks as you move to the rear. You can stop immediately by using the Jump key. Using a custom command allows you to reuse the skill to stop it immediately.
You can chain it with Magnum Rush, Magnum Flash, or Burning Breaker.
It can be charged by holding the key down, and when activated after charging, using your other skill cancels the skill and activates Charging Arm: Wearving. Charging is possible while using other skills other than Charging Arm, and up to 2 skills can be charged at once. Also permanently increases damage dealt by Magnum Drive.
Custom command On/Off: Right-click
Required skill: Charging Arm: Bobbing Lv. 15 or above
Lv. 15 Effect: Can learn 4th Job Skill ""Magnum Flash".
